header_text: Your pay was recently cut, and you will need to ask your family for some help affording expenses this month. You feel terrible asking since they have already supported you a lot financially in the past. You remind yourself that needing a little extra help every now and then is okay.

elements.Text: Is it okay to not be able to support yourself for now?
